item.title: eSuite Items Overview
item.dc:creator: dava-LOC
item.description: Information The eSuite software keeps the item information in different tables, called item tables. They are essential for creating items, generating prices and tracking cost information. Item tables can be accessed from the Items menu in the launcher. The Items entry consists of three sub-entries: Master, providing price, cost, POS and main item information and […]

item.title: eSuite Dimensions Overview
item.dc:creator: dava-LOC
item.description: Information The Dimensions entry is common to both the Batch, Buy, Care, Sell and the Manage modules. It gives access to lists (departments, sub-departments, categories, etc.), it provides financial information and it allows producing reports on various aspects of retail management (total sales, sales by vendor, department, category, etc.). The Dimensions entry is split in […]
